definition.description: This flow is currently set up to be triggered manually by a user or another system. It does not contain any actions or steps after the trigger, so nothing happens when it runs. The flow is essentially a blank template, ready for you to add actions and logic to automate your desired process.

uiDefinition.description: The GSA API key which can be obtained from https://open.gsa.gov/api/perdiem

properties.description: Per diem rates are the allowed reimbursement rates for hotel stays and meals for federal travelers. Rates are set for each of the federal government's fiscal years (October 1st to September 30th) GSA is responsible for setting the rates in the continental United States. Many businesses and other organizations adopt these rates as well. This API provides access to the current rate information.

properties.description: Provides access to Microsoft Dataverse actions and triggers for Power Platform environments.
Provides access to Microsoft Dataverse actions and triggers for Power Platform environments.

Per diem rates are the allowed reimbursement rates for hotel stays and meals for federal travelers. Rates are set for each of the federal government's fiscal years (October 1st to September 30th) GSA is responsible for setting the rates in the continental United States. Many businesses and other organizations adopt these rates as well. This API provides access to the current rate information.
